snippet: Bangladesh on Tuesday turned away three boats carrying 1,000 Rohingya Muslims fleeing violence in Myanmar, bringing to 1,500 the number of refugees blocked in recent days, officials said.
abstract: Bangladesh turns away three boats carrying 1,000 Rohingya Muslims fleeing violence in Myanmar, bringing to 1,500 the number of refugees blocked.
lead_paragraph: Bangladesh on Tuesday turned away three boats carrying 1,000 Rohingya Muslims fleeing violence in Myanmar, bringing to 1,500 the number of refugees blocked in recent days, officials said.

headline.main: Bangladesh: Boats of Myanmar Refugees Turned Away
headline.print_headline: Bangladesh: Boats of Myanmar Refugees Turned Away
